phrases: Well, we somehow managed to stop the Dragon Chain Cannon.
We managed somehow once I rushed onto the scene!
What are you trying to prove?
By the way, you are heavy, Lucy.
I could see you being like, 0.05 tons.
Do not measure it in tons!
And why did you crash land when you were only carrying one person?
You just have to keep pushin' that, do not you?
They just keep comin' out of the woodwork.
I guess we have no choice.
Why are they aiming at Happy and Carla?
We have turned most of the Exceeds that ran for it into lacrima!
All that is left are those two.
Now stand still, so we can turn you into our kingdom's magic power!
So you do not give a damn what happens to the Exceed, if it is for your own magic power?
Is that what the humans are like on this world?
I are not going to let you hurt my friends, you filthy bastards!
I met Gajeel on my way here.
Things have moved pretty far along.
It is true that his info is always reliable, but...
The Kingdom is trying to sacrifice the Exceed, Earthland, and us,
and make the entire world theirs to do as they please!
We cannot let them get away with that, can we?
But the Royal Army has a huge amount of magic power...
Could we win if we fought them?
Furthermore, the Royal Army has a number of very powerful foes.
Do we even have a chance of winning against them?
I propose that we wait until the battle between the Exceed and the Kingdom is over!
They will both be tired out, and when we show up,
we could take them both out!
Well, that method might have merit.
In other words, make the most of the opportunity.
Or, we could ally with the Kingdom.
We put the Kingdom in our debt,
and get them to recognize us.
This might be a chance to make up with the Kingdom.
I hate how you smother me!
We should know better than anyone that the Kingdom is not so weak!
Far from making up with them, I bet we would be treated even worse than before!
Droy's suggestion is also not possible.
When the Exceed are wiped out, the Kingdom will surely move on to their next ambition!
They will suppress anyone who opposes them, and we will fall into a new dark age!
We will lose the one opening we have!
This is no time for humans to be fighting with the Exceed!
You have no chance of winning!
Everyone is suffering from lack of magic power...
It is only natural for a king to tax his people.
Droma Anim is constantly absorbing magic power from the entire world...
That is also the reason it is a forbidden weapon.
Once activated, I have a duty to win, for the sake of the world!
You are just stealin' magic for yourself!
How can you say that with a straight face?!
See, we joined a guild so that we could live.
I might not know much'bout this world.
But for the sake of all the living things of this world, I will defeat you!
I-I am scared, I really am!
Maybe we should not do anything and just hide...
Honestly speaking, as long as I can live together in peace with Bis Bis, I will be happy.
We should not be searching out danger ourselves.
What a bunch of spineless wimps!
When the Exceeds are all gone, they will come after us next!
But no matter what you say, everyone knows how fearsome the Kingdom is.
Tail here does not have any magic power left...
We can only long-distance transfer once more.
If we jump into this fight, there is no pulling out.
Gate of the Lion, I open thee!
That is going to be our magic power!
I think everyone is said their opinion.
It is about time to decide.
I want people to hear one last thing.
Right now the Fairy Tail from Earthland is fighting the Kingdom, risking their lives!
Earthland's Natsu, Gray, myself, and everyone else!
At this rate... everyone is going to die...
We cannot just stand back and watch while they are killed!
We have to cut open a path to our world's future ourselves!
Natsu and Erza should still be fighting!
We cannot give up before they do!
We are the only ones who can stand against the Kingdom now!
It is like a tree that is moving on its own...
Those guys who only ever run away?
We will show you the power of the bonds of friendship!
It is the Edolas Fairy Tail!
The Earthland Fairy Tail is fighting,
I cannot believe there are two Grays!
Ooh, I wish I were them...
You are me, so why cannot you feel what I do?
Just look at my beloved Juvia-chan!
We cannot lose either, Al Al!
Make sure to show up Lucy, boys!
Let me show you the strongest power in Fairy Tail!
He is even faster than me!
Gray is drooling all over Juvia?
Plus, Jet and Droy are contending for the strongest?
There is so much completely backwards!
Our feelings are making this world change.
We are Shadow Gear, the strongest of them all!
No matter where you go, our guild's making trouble...
You still have not experienced the ultimate form of the Ten Commandments!
A holy lance forged by the greatest blacksmith in Edolas.
Its attack brings ultimate destruction that resounds out into the land.
I need hardly explain why it bears the name of our guild.
So you are saying that is your strongest magic, then?
With that attack, the floating island can no longer stay afloat.
Neither of us has any magic power left.
And yet I will strike you down!
No matter how many times you stand, you will never be able to defeat me!
Those with magic power will rule the world!
That is something this world requires!
Stop twistin' logic to justify your actions!
I do not know whether it requires it or not, but I do know I am going to bust that thing up!
Would you please refrain from wasting all the magic power?
Because all your magic power is mine!
Do not even joke about that!
My magic power is my own!
It are not no one else's but mine...
Your magic power, your very lives...
They are all mine for the taking!
Try taking a page out of that other Gray's book and strip down!
Do not you realize what you are doing is wrong?
There should be some people against what the Kingdom is doing here.
If they disobey, they will be killed, so they have no choice but to fight!
I would much rather have a tea party with everyone, but no!
Even so, we have no choice but to counterattack them.
Is the guy with glasses your boyfriend?
Do we look that way to you?
You are also Lucy, so I guess you can tell.
Happy is here for me, so...
I will be nearby, and if anything happens, I will protect you.
I cannot lose, for the sake of eternal energy!
For your accursed eternity, how many sacrifices have been made in your now?
They stand up for the people they care about!
They pick up swords for those who she would tears!
Cannot you hear this world screaming in agony, Knightwalker?!
I am sure I can feel them more than you!
When I say the world, I mean the living things!
This world is heading toward oblivion.
It is a world running out of magic, plunging toward its death!
A person from Earthland like you could never understand!
The anxiety, fear, despair of having magic disappear!
We cannot survive unless we get an eternal source of magic power!
But we are alive, are not we?
We do not have any magic power, but we are alive!
We have both used it all up!
And yet, we are not dead!
We have the strength to overcome the weakness and the fear!
That is what it means to be alive!
Inside of you is the same frailty and evil that lies within me!
Therefore, I know you hold a heart that can love others!
Listen to the voices of the living, with your entire heart!
I do not have any strength left to move...
This battle is not one that could be won or lost.
The chamber that creates the Anima?
Prince, what in the world are you...
I observed Earthland for a long time.
There was strife, but it was a wonderful world.
I am sure they will accept this...
This is the only way to rid this world of war.
I will create a world where people can be open with each other.
I will throw the Anima into reverse...
It is just a fake dragon but it is pretty tough!
I guess they do not call it an ultimate weapon for nothing.
It is a real pain that magic does not work on it.
But we have three Dragon Slayers on our side!
Next time: I am Standing Here!
But Natsu, do you have any magic power left?
Even if I did not, I would do it somehow!
I will show you the stubborn pride of Fairy Tail!
